statements: SELECT * FROM ar_content_assets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT content_name, content_type FROM ar_content_assets WHERE campaign_id = 123;
SELECT id, content_name, file_path FROM ar_content_assets WHERE content_type = 'image';
SELECT * FROM ar_content_assets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT content_name FROM ar_content_assets WHERE content_type = 'video' AND campaign_id = 456;
SELECT id, content_name FROM ar_content_assets WHERE campaign_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM ar_content_assets WHERE content_type = 'video' AND campaign_id = 2
SELECT content_name, file_path FROM ar_content_assets WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' AND created_at < '2022-12-31'
SELECT id, content_name, file_path FROM ar_content_assets ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id, content_type FROM ar_content_assets
SELECT * FROM ar_content_assets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT asset_name, category FROM ar_content_assets WHERE category = 'video';
SELECT * FROM media_files WHERE file_type = 'image' ORDER BY uploaded_at ASC;
SELECT asset_name FROM ar_content_assets WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM media_files WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, category FROM ar_content_assets WHERE category = 'image' ORDER BY asset_id DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, created_at FROM ar_content_assets WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM ar_content_assets INNER JOIN media_files ON ar_content_assets.asset_id = media_files.asset_id WHERE file_type = 'video' AND file_size > 1000 ORDER BY media_files.uploaded_at DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, updated_at FROM ar_content_assets WHERE updated_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_id, category FROM ar_content_assets WHERE category IN ('image', 'document') ORDER BY category, asset_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM AR_Content_Assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM AR_Content_Assets WHERE asset_size > 1000 ORDER BY uploaded_date DESC;
SELECT id, asset_name, asset_type, uploaded_date FROM AR_Content_Assets WHERE uploaded_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Media_Files WHERE uploaded_by = 'John Doe' ORDER BY file_size ASC;
SELECT id, campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM Advertising_Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 AND status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM AR_Content_Assets WHERE asset_type = 'Image' ORDER BY uploaded_date DESC;
SELECT id, asset_name, asset_size FROM AR_Content_Assets WHERE asset_type = 'Video' AND asset_size > 1000;
SELECT asset_name, asset_size, uploaded_date FROM AR_Content_Assets WHERE asset_size BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY uploaded_date;
SELECT file_name, file_type, uploaded_by FROM Media_Files ORDER BY file_name ASC, uploaded_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, status FROM Advertising_Campaigns WHERE status = 'Active' AND budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ARContentAssets;
SELECT id, asset_name, asset_type FROM ARContentAssets ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT file_path FROM ARContentAssets WHERE asset_type='image';
SELECT * FROM MediaFiles WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM AdvertisingCampaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM ARContentAssets WHERE asset_type = 'image' AND file_path LIKE '%example%';
SELECT id, asset_name, created_at FROM ARContentAssets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT MAX(budget) AS max_budget, MIN(budget) AS min_budget FROM AdvertisingCampaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT ca.position, aa.asset_name, ac.campaign_name FROM CampaignAssets ca JOIN ARContentAssets aa ON ca.asset_id = aa.id JOIN AdvertisingCampaigns ac ON ca.campaign_id = ac.id WHERE ac.end_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT mf.file_name, mf.file_type, aa.asset_name FROM MediaFiles mf JOIN ARContentAssets aa ON mf.file_type = aa.asset_type WHERE mf.upload_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM ar_content_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM ar_content_assets WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT file_name, file_type, file_size FROM media_files ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, start_time, end_time FROM ad_scheduling WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';

SELECT content_id, asset_name FROM ar_content_assets ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE status = 'Active'
SELECT * FROM campaign_assets WHERE added_at > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM ad_scheduling WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday'
